metadata.description: Subin's closet synced from clothes.js canonical list with added seasons and descriptions.

items.name: Black Coat
items.description: Midweight black wool outer coat (thickness 4) with a chic, minimal formal vibe; best over slim knits, blouses, or suiting, and leaves room to layer a blazer or cardigan underneath for colder fall/winter days.

items.name: White Puffer Jacket
items.description: Heavy white puffer (outer, thickness 5) for casual winter days; the neutral tone matches denim, leggings, or sweats, and works best with a thin base layer or hoodie underneath since it is the topmost shell in wind and snow.

items.name: Sky Blue Knit
items.description: Sky-blue midweight knit top (thickness 3) that swings casual-to-formal; pairs with denim for weekends or with trousers/skirts for office looks, and is slim enough to sit under blazers or coats as a cozy middle layer.

items.name: White Blouse
items.description: Lightweight white blouse (top, thickness 1) in a feminine-formal style; ideal as an inner layer under jackets and cardigans, and easy to dress up with skirts or tailored pants while still fitting under structured outerwear.

items.name: Grey Sweatshirt
items.description: Beige/grey crewneck sweatshirt (top, thickness 2) with a casual minimal look; great with jeans or leggings, doubles as a comfy mid-layer under coats, and can sit over tees or base layers without bulk.

items.name: Black Long-Sleeve Tee
items.description: Black long-sleeve tee (top, thickness 1) in a minimal/sporty cut; functions as a base layer under jackets, puffers, or cardigans, and pairs with leggings, skirts, or denim when worn solo.

items.name: Red Cardigan
items.description: Red cardigan (top, thickness 2) with a casual-feminine tone; meant to be a mid-layer over tees, blouses, or dresses, and slim enough to slip under coats for extra warmth while adding a pop of color.

items.name: Black Bootcut Pants
items.description: Black bootcut pants (bottom, thickness 2) in a minimal yet feminine silhouette; dress up with blouses or down with knits, easy to pair with boots or heels, and sit cleanly under longer coats without bulk.

items.name: Black Pleated Skirt
items.description: Lightweight black pleated skirt (bottom, thickness 1) with a feminine feel; works with tees or knits for casual looks and with blouses for formal outfits, and layers well with tights plus long coats or cardigans.

items.name: Black Leggings
items.description: Stretchy black leggings (bottom, thickness 2) in a sporty-minimal style; go-to base for athleisure with sweatshirts or tees, and useful as a warm inner layer under long tops, dresses, or skirts in colder seasons.
